queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT val) FROM {tbl1}
SELECT groupingCol, COUNT(DISTINCT val) FROM {tbl1} GROUP BY groupingCol
SELECT l.groupingCol, COUNT(DISTINCT l.val), COUNT(DISTINCT r.val) FROM {tbl1} l JOIN {tbl2} r ON l.groupingCol = r.groupingCol GROUP BY l.groupingCol
SELECT l.groupingCol, COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT(l.val, r.val)) FROM {tbl1} l JOIN {tbl2} r ON l.groupingCol = r.groupingCol GROUP BY l.groupingCol
SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_aggregate='true') */ groupingCol, COUNT(DISTINCT val) FROM {tbl1} GROUP BY groupingCol

SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_aggregate='true') */ l.groupingCol, COUNT(DISTINCT l.val), COUNT(DISTINCT r.val) FROM {tbl1} l JOIN {tbl2} r ON l.groupingCol = r.groupingCol GROUP BY l.groupingCol

SELECT groupingCol, DISTINCTCOUNT(val) FROM {tbl1} GROUP BY groupingCol
SELECT l.groupingCol, DISTINCTCOUNT(l.val), DISTINCTCOUNT(r.val) FROM {tbl1} l JOIN {tbl2} r ON l.groupingCol = r.groupingCol GROUP BY l.groupingCol
SELECT l.groupingCol, DISTINCTCOUNT(CONCAT(l.val, r.val)) FROM {tbl1} l JOIN {tbl2} r ON l.groupingCol = r.groupingCol GROUP BY l.groupingCol
